original_text: But the Babylonian army pursued them and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho. They captured him and took him to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon at Riblah in the land of Hamath, where he pronounced sentence on him.
korean_text: 갈대아인의 군대가 그들을 따라 여리고 평원에서 시드기야에게 미쳐 그를 잡아서 데리고 하맛 땅 립나에 있는 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕에게로 올라가매 왕이 그를 심문하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the Babylonian army pursued them
and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho.
and took him to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
at Riblah in the land of Hamath,
where he pronounced sentence on him.
